thread.title: Cyara Names Bill Bryant as Director of Global Alliances
thread.title_full: Cyara Names Bill Bryant as Director of Global Alliances

author: Becky Roberts
title: Cyara Names Bill Bryant as Director of Global Alliances
text:
Cyara announced today that it has hired Bill Bryant as Director of Global Alliances. This is a new position for Cyara and represents the Company’s strong commitment to strengthening partner relationships as a key plank in their strategy for global growth. “Bill has an exceptional record of leading partner programs to double-digit growth, and he will be a solid addition to the Cyara team. We believe that dedicated attention to existing partner relationships and cultivating new partners is a key to our overall strategy. We are super excited that Bill has decided to join Cyara, ” Alok Kulkarni, Cyara CEO, said in announcing this addition. “Bill brings proven leadership to inspire partner relationships and organizational skills to add even more value to Cyara partners through a world-class partner program,” Kulkarni added.
Prior to his current role, Bryant led North American Sales for Wacom, the world-wide leader of intuitive and natural user interface technologies widely used in smartphones and tablets. He started his career as a Technical Sales Representative with Dialogic/Intel rising through the ranks over 14 years to direct global Channel Sales and Marketing living and working in the United States and Europe.
“I am very excited to be joining Cyara at this point in time,” Bryant said. “While Cyara’s current partner base is certainly significant, I believe there is untapped opportunity to partner with like-minded companies and further expand Cyara’s global footprint,” he said. “With the Cyara product set, which is unmatched by any other vendor out there, and their industry recognition, particularly in the past year, there is plenty of opportunity for growth,” he added.
About Cyara
Cyara is the global market-leading provider of an omni-channel customer experience testing and monitoring platform and was recently named a Gartner Cool Vendor in CRM Customer Service and Customer Support, 2015. Cyara enables its customers to rapidly innovate while dramatically reducing the cost of development and testing and the risk of exposing their customers to poor customer experiences. Every day, millions of flawless customer interactions are delivered by some of the most recognizable brands in the world utilizing the Cyara Platform. http://www.cyara.com . For more information, please visit http://www.cyara.com , or connect with Cyara on Linkedin, Twitter and Facebook.
Company Contact: media(at)cyarasolutions(dot)com.
